passages.text:
Huh ?, What warrent your presence here?.
[[(CheckTalkedToLogarFalse)]]

[[(StrongWarriorResponse)]]
[[(StrongMagicianResponse)]]
[[(StrongMatyrResponse)]]
[[(WarriorAndMatyrResponse)]]
[[(MagicianAndMatyrResponse)]]
[[(WarriorAndMagicianResponse)]]
passages.name: Begin

passages.text:
Savages!. You [em1]Junras[/em1] are only bringing nothing but dread. Be gone! [em2]Unja[/em2]
Conditions: (passthrough)
Variable["Warrior"] >=2 and Variable["TalkedToLogar"] == true
passages.name: (StrongWarriorResponse)

passages.text:
Oh wise [em1]Junra[/em1], I have heard stories about your kind. It seem all of them are wrong.


[[(MagicianAndMatyrPraise)]]
Conditions: (passthrough)
Variable["Magician"] >=2 and Variable["TalkedToLogar"] == true
passages.name: (StrongMagicianResponse)

passages.text:
Oh kind [em1]Junra[/em1], It seems you have brought back compassion on your journey.

[[(MagicianAndMatyrPraise)]]
Conditions:(passthrough)
Variable["Matyr"] >=2 and Variable["TalkedToLogar"] == true
passages.name: (StrongMatyrResponse)

passages.text:
Strength and Compassion, it seems. Reasonable. We may exhange words but tread carefully [em1]Junra[/em1].

Conditions:(passthrough)
Variable["Matyr"] >= 1 and
Variable["Warrior"] >= 1 and Variable["TalkedToLogar"] == true
passages.name: (WarriorAndMatyrResponse)

passages.text:
Wisdom and Compassion. Wonderful. Let's us exchange words oh [em1]Great Junra[/em1].

Conditions:(passthrough)
Variable["Matyr"] >= 1 and
Variable["Magician"] >= 1 and Variable["TalkedToLogar"] == true
passages.name: (MagicianAndMatyrResponse)

passages.text:
Wisdom and Strength ?!. What have you gone through to obtain such personality !?. I wish to know more.

Conditions:(passthrough)
Variable["Warrior"] >= 1 and
Variable["Magician"] >= 1 and Variable["TalkedToLogar"] == true
passages.name: (WarriorAndMagicianResponse)

passages.text: You are not savages as they foretold. Yet, your presence is not a welcome one.
passages.name: (MagicianAndMatyrPraise)

passages.text:
Don't bother reply! I'm busy right now. Go away!.

Conditions:(passthrough)
Variable["TalkedToLogar"] == false
passages.name: (CheckTalkedToLogarFalse)
